title: shrI venkaTEshvarA
sahitya:
shrI venkatEshvarA dEvAdi dEvA sEvaDi malarE sharaNam sharaNam


anupallavi

  shrI paramAnandA mukundA shentAmaraik-kaNNA tirumAl maghan vaLar mArbA dIna dayAparA


caraNam    AdimUla gOpAlA aru nAn marai mUlA aDiyArk-kinidaruL sheidiDum hari mAdhava mAyA pAdam gatiyena vandEn pannaga 
shayanA nin tirup-pAdam gatiyena vandEn pannaga shayanA kamazhum paindunbam magizh perumA paramAnandamE aruLE
